title: A comprehensive review of hydrogen storage: toward nanoconfinement-enhanced borohydride and alanate complex hydrides
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00353E, Review Article
Amanuel Gidey Gebretatios, Fawzi Banat, Chin Kui Cheng
Hydrogen energy has been identified as a renewable and carbon-neutral energy carrier for the exponentially increasing energy demand and as a substitute for fossil fuels. Hydrogen storage is crucial for...
